imdb.plot outline: Open Book is a weekly television program focusing on the writers and other storytellers living and working in a different spot on the planet. The premiere features writers and other artists -including actors and musicians-currently living and working in Ft. Greene, Brooklyn. In addition to the weekly half-hour broadcast, each guest's segment from Open Book will be released as an independent short film online through blogs, websites and social media.
imdb.title: Open Book
plot: _Open Book_ (qv) is a weekly television program focusing on the writers and other storytellers living and working in a different spot on the planet. The premiere features writers and other artists -including actors and musicians-currently living and working in Ft. Greene, Brooklyn. In addition to the weekly half-hour broadcast, each guest's segment from _Open Book_ (qv) will be released as an independent short film online through blogs, websites and social media.::Ina Parker-Howard
